participant_1.background:
I listen to the wind howl outside my window, enjoying the cold air and the solitude.
I have a laptop because I move around a lot and need to be able to work on my computer wherever I am.
i despise sweet potatoes.
I love my cats and I'm afraid of losing them.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.

participant_2.background:
My favorite people are the ones who support me and encourage me to be the best version of myself.
I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions.
i run marathons.
I hope I can use my martial arts skills to protect myself and others.
i have three beautiful dogs and one cat.

content.text: Hello, my name is [username]. It's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too! What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to run marathons, teach martial arts, and spend time with my pets.
Wow, those are all really cool hobbies! I have three cats of my own. I love them so much!
I have three dogs and one cat. I love spending time with them, too!
What kind of martial arts do you teach?
I teach Taekwondo and Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. I love helping people learn how to defend themselves.
That's so great! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
What's your favorite part about running marathons?
I love the feeling of accomplishment when I finish one. It's a great feeling to know that you can push yourself to your limits and achieve something difficult.
That's awesome! I'm not sure I'm brave enough to try a marathon, but I admire people who do.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun and a great way to challenge yourself.
I might have to! Thanks for the encouragement.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to talk about my hobbies.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
